channel.title: Db Backup on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Db Backup on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Advanced Parameters - Database - DB Backup - Create, Download and Delete
item.description: BO - Advanced Parameters - Database - DB Backup - Create, Download and Delete Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1169 Steps Step Description Expected result go to database > sql manager page title contains ‘SQL Manager’ go to db backup page title contains ‘DB Backup’ get number of db backups number of backups = 0 Click on “I have read the disclaimer , Please create a new backup " Successful message is displayed ="

item.title: BO - Advanced Parameters - Database - DB Backup - Pagination , Bulk Delete
